trans-unit.source: Represents the cell in the top left corner of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> that sits above the row headers and to the left of the column headers.
Clicking on the top left header cell selects all of the cells in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTopLeftHeaderCell"></xref> class.
Creates a new accessible object for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTopLeftHeaderCell"></xref>.

If you do not explicitly call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTopLeftHeaderCell.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> method, it will be called when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AccessibilityObject%2A> property is referenced.
To get or set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AccessibilityObject%2A>, you must add a reference to the `Accessibility` assembly installed with the .NET Framework.

A new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTopLeftHeaderCell.DataGridViewTopLeftHeaderCellAccessibleObject"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTopLeftHeaderCell"></xref>.
Returns the bounding rectangle that encloses the cell's content area, which is calculated using the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object and cell style.
The size of the cell's contents is computed dynamically when this method is called.
This method is called internally when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContentBounds%2A> property is read.
The graphics context for the cell.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> to be applied to the cell.
The index of the cell's parent row.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that bounds the cell's contents.
rowIndex does not equal -1.
Returns the bounding rectangle that encloses the cell's error icon, if one is displayed.
The size of the cell's error icon area is computed dynamically when this method is called.
This method is called internally when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorIconBounds%2A> property is read.
The graphics context for the cell.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> to be applied to the cell.
The index of the cell's parent row.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that bounds the cell's error icon, if one is displayed; otherwise, <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle.Empty"></xref>.
rowIndex does not equal -1.
Calculates the preferred size, in pixels, of the cell.
This method relies on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetFormattedValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to draw the cell.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> that represents the style of the cell.
The zero-based row index of the cell.
The cell's maximum allowable size.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that represents the preferred size, in pixels, of the cell.
rowIndex does not equal -1.
Paints the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTopLeftHeaderCell"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to paint the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the area of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> that needs to be repainted.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that contains the bounds of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> that is being painted.
The row index of the cell that is being painted.
A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"></xref> values that specifies the state of the cell.
The data of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> that is being painted.
The formatted data of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> that is being painted.
An error message that is associated with the cell.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> that contains formatting and style information about the cell.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> that contains border styles for the cell that is being painted.
A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts"></xref> values that specifies which parts of the cell need to be painted.
Paints the border of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to paint the border.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the area of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> that needs to be repainted.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that contains the area of the border that is being painted.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> that contains formatting and style information about the cell.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> that contains border styles of the border that is being painted.
Returns the string representation of the cell.
A string that represents the current cell.
